dcterms:description: A list of records of publicly disclosed computer security vulnerabilities, operated and maintained by MITRE, containing an identification number (CVE ID), a description of the vulnerability, and at least one public reference.
dcterms:title: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE)

dcterms:description: A database that builds upon the information provided by CVE records to provide enhanced information for each record such as fix information, severity scores, and impact ratings, maintained by NIST.
dcterms:title: National Vulnerability Database (NVD)

dcterms:creator: FIRST
dcterms:description: A standard to describe the principal characteristics of a vulnerability and assess its severity relative to other vulnerabilities, providing a vector that contains a set of metrics.
dcterms:title: Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)

dcterms:description: Detail of a specific vulnerability (CVE-2018-4878), including its CVSS vector and severity score, which is a use-after-free vulnerability discovered in Adobe Flash Player.
dcterms:title: CVE-2018-4878
